name: Super Fruit Match
description:
Super Fruit Match Pupular puzzle game people love and play all the time.

Connect three symbols horizontally or vertically to clear them.

Touch the adjacent Fruit to swap them.Make 3 or more with the same types together to clear them.

Pass the levels and try to get 3 stars in each level.

* Cool UI

* Easy and Fun to play

* Support Android 3.0+

* Leaderboard and achievement

* Score mode

* Ice Cubes mode

* Time mode

* In App purchase so you can buy more moves when you need them

* 100 levels

If you would like to see this app translated in your language, please email us.

Thank you for your support!
